reviews: I had to write a review on this sweatshirt because the value for me was primo. The price was outstanding. $10.99 before tax! And with prime I got free shipping. I am so pleased with this purchase that I‚Äôve bought three in total now. FYI -The sweatshirt is definitely a thin sweatshirt but that‚Äôs actually what I wanted was a thin sweatshirt that still had that oversized comfy sweatshirt look that I can wear with tights. I am a female and I usually wear an extra small or small top. I chose the men‚Äôs medium to get that cozy oversized sweatshirt look. It fits EXACTLY how I like and just covers my bum (5‚Äô2‚Äù, 113lbs for reference). I am stoked about this purchase. I love that the sweatshirt is thin because sometimes I get too warm in normal thicker sweatshirts (woodstove in my house). Plus it will be a perfect throw on sweatshirt in summer. It‚Äôs kind of like somewhere in between a cotton longsleeve and a warm sweatshirt in terms of the fabric weight. Hoping they do some other more toned down colours. I got the stonewashed green, the denim blue and the maroon Those were the only 3 colours I likedüòÜ some reviewers say it seems cheap but it is totally what I wanted and yes it was cheap. So long as you hang it to dry rather than wreck it in the dryer it should hold up well for quite awhile

It fits nicely, it feels warm and cosy, and it looks good (especially under a black leather vest). People tell me that I look like a pumpkin when I wear it, which I think is very whimsical and reflective of my personality. I recommend it for this price; keep in mind that this colour is hard to find in department stores.

review_title: If your a long body it‚Äôll fit short
reviews: I‚Äôve got a long body and it came down to my belt line which was nice but don't be waving your hands in the air like you just don't care or be the person who puts there arms around the backs in group pictures as opposed to going over your friends shoulders.

The sweatshirt is not too thick and and not too thin it it's very comfortable I recommend getting a size smaller than normal though also if you get the colour ash it actually looks like white with little gray spots
Great quality for the price! Warm but still breathable. My boyfriend and I used these to make ugly Christmas sweaters for the holiday season. Very impressed with the quality and cut for the fabric.

Honestly I was not expecting a lot because of the low price but when they arrived I was so happy! They are SO soft and quite well made! Once you put the sweater on, you won't want to take it off. I'm using them for my merch and pressed on a graphic, and I will be perfectly confident reselling them as quality sweatshirts. Will 100% be ordering again!

Perfect for the upcoming spring weather. I got a large as I wanted it a little bigger to be able to put a T-shirt underneath it. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô8 140 pounds and it fit exactly how I wanted it to. I got a compliment on the colour today so I‚Äôm pleased .

I purchased a small, I'm 5'6 and 130 lbs. I also purchased another brand around the same price range and this one comes in second place. Its decent, but the other brand seems to fit nicer (for a female) its a bit more frumpier than the other brand. Definitely worth this price.

review_title: Thinner material perfect for spring/fall & fits true to size
reviews: As other reviews suggest, the sweater isn't the thicker kind of sweatshirt that you might imagine it to be so if you're hoping for a thick 80s type sweatshirt then maybe look elsewhere. I for one am happy with the style. It's more of a light weight cotton type material with the traditional fleecy interior - as I would describe it. Very happy with this purchase for the spring season. To give you perspective: I'm 5"7 and average weight but bought a size L to have the baggy look with the sweater covering my bum in leggings and it really fits the way I hoped it would. The Heather grey is like a very bright, almost white grey with specks. Would totally recommend and will def buy other colors.

review_title: It is a must to have.
reviews:
I like its simplicity that goes with any colorful scarf of mine for the season.
The delivery person was very impressive. That person was pleasant and very professional. I have had quite a few deliveries, and today this person left a pretty strong impression with me. So, it is my lucky product to say the least.

This is a great sweatshirt for women. It is not heavy, comes in great colours (I got sage) and rivals a lot of long sleeved shirts at very expensive stores. The fit is perfect. Now that I have one, all of my friends have ordered them too.

I purchased this hoodie for myself as an XL because I wanted something to wear with tights/leggings on a cold spring evening. It's so soft and I love the color! The sleeves are a little too long for me, I'm 5"5. I will most definitely be buying another one in a different color.
Great casual wear and for that price. I felt this was thinner fleece as compared to the previous purchase even though the price was same.

This sweater was a great value in price. It is a bit thin probably won‚Äôt last for many washes but nothing you wouldn‚Äôt expect for the price your paying. Inside the sweater is super soft I could wear it all day and absolutely no itch. I used it to print on for a specific event and it satisfied its purpose. I will definitely purchase again if needed.
The body of the shirt is super short/wide and the arms are ridiculously long. Can't wear, can't return. Don't waste your money. I'm a L/XL so I ordered XL to be safe...the body fits like a short 2XL.

I bought the green one and the purple one in a bigger size to wear with jeans for casual days. So so comfortable! My only complaint is that the fabric looks "old" really quickly, even if I handwash the sweater instead of washing in the washing machine. It takes away nothing from its comfort though and the fabric didn't thin out or anything as such.

These sweaters are awesome. I bought a few for lounging and they are just perfect, so soft, consistent sizing, shrink a little but not too much, such a good price and fit great. Bought them oversized for comfort, I bought my normal size in women‚Äôs clothing and they fit large which is what I wanted (if you are looking to wear it as a sweater dress definitely size up).

I usually wear a ladies large so this men's medium is great. It's a little long on my 5'2" frame but I like that. Bonus, the sleeves are long enough to cover my whole wrist and onto my palm and, if I need it shorter, I can just roll up the cuff a little. It has been washed 3 times now and still no pilling. Great buy!

Great sweater overall. Bought in 2 colours: maroon and ash grey, and both colours turned out as expected. I wanted a looser fitting sweater so I bought a size large (for reference I am 5'8" and ~180lbs) and it fits as desired (quite loose around arms, and torso). Sleeves might be a bit short, I think they only fit because I got it oversized. The bottom elastic is not super thick or strong, so it does ride up a bit when you move around. A thinner sweater as well, but good for layering. Have washed several times and hung to dry and no shrinkage.

review_title: Comfortable enough to wear all day!
reviews: I wear a large in Female sizes, and a medium in Men's sizes. This fit exactly how a men's medium fits on me. I like this sweater because it's not heavy, but still warm enough to keep me warm at work (it's always cold at work!). I also prefer this sweater over the ladies' sweaters because it's longer and tastefully works with leggings or tighter fitting pants. They're also comfortable enough to wear outside of work. I really love these sweaters!

It fits perfectly! Bought this for myself and I'm a woman who just likes comfy sweaters and I find that men's clothing sometimes fits that idea better. The quality is great (especially for the price) and I can't wait to grab another in another color.

I bought two. I end to wear one while the other one is in the laundry. It's not that I don't have other things to ware but these a just perfect for around the house. I tend to keep the house at 21.5 C and I don't have to bother changing when I put on a winter jacket to go somewhere.

review_title: Order a size down they‚Äôre made big!
reviews: Love the ash grey it‚Äôs like white but with hints of grey going through it, I‚Äôm a girl and wanted a oversized sweater, I normally take a XL in ladies so I ordered a size down in men‚Äôs I ordered a L and they made very big the large looks like an XL, so definitely order a size or 2 down! Overall super comfortable and not too thin, would buy again!
Love it. Got size small and fits great. Super comfy. A little smell but I‚Äôm sure it will go away once washed

I am very pleased with my purchase. I bought Hanes sweatshirts in two different colours. One is made in El Salvador, the other in Honduras.

The shirts fit well, look good, and are comfortable to wear. I would describe the material as a medium weight, which suits me just fine.

Love this! I'm a 25 y/o girl and I like baggy comfy clothes, so I got this sweater in Large in the color stonewashed green. Love the color and the sizing is perfect. I would 100% recommend this to anyone who likes comfy and inexpensive clothing!

I love oversized sweaters just to be comfortable in and stay at home. This sweater is perfect for just that! I got purple, which is super cute. I got an X-Large because I wanted it to be long on me, I'm 5'4. I love the quality as well. It's not thin material, but it's pretty thick and durable. Will buy more in other colors!

I have owned a lot of different manufacturers sweatshirt but this Hanes is by far the best I have owned. It is very soft material, fleecy inside and very comfy and cozy.....LOVE IT! I bought 2 more in different colours.

AMAZING! This crew neck is soft, comfortable, warm, yet not too heavy. Originally out of the package, the material feels a little stiff, however, once you wash it, it‚Äôs perfect and becomes softer! I‚Äôm a female, 5‚Äô2 110lbs and purchased a small. It is oversized but not to the point that I feel like I‚Äôm drowning in it. Depending on the fit you‚Äôre looking for, I‚Äôd recommend to either stay at the size you usually are or go up a size. Awesome purchase... will definitely be ordering some more soon!

So I ordered this hoodless sweatshirt and I received one with a hood. I don‚Äôt really care because it‚Äôs just for around the house so it‚Äôs all good but you might not receive the one pictured. It‚Äôs comfy and the green that I ordered so I‚Äôm happy overall.

Nice big, roomy soft sweater. I love wearing these anywhere, hikes, around the house, running out for errands. If I could wear only these forever, I would. They do loose their quality after half a dozen washes or so.

review_title: Got 4 different colours for my husband
reviews: My husband loves these sweatshirts. I bought 4 different colours for him. The thickness is just right! with a thin lining of fleece, it‚Äôs either too thick or too thin! They fit very well! And the cotton fabric feels comfy.

review_title: good value, a bit boxy though
reviews: Pretty good for the price, a little boxy, so if you're looking for a long and slim sweater this is not really the fit. However, it's great a little oversized if you're into that feel/look. Inside is soft and fuzzy which creates lots of lint on black clothes but after 2 washes & drys it was fine. Would buy again for basic sweater.

review_title: Wash colorful hoodies separately cheap color washed after one wash i dont recommend to buy this
reviews: When i washed this Maroon color along with my other clothes the color washed from this hoodie make stains on my other clothes this is the problem with these colorful hoodies. Quality of color is not good i don't recommend to buy this cheap products otherwise it will make stains on your other costly clothes.

I purchased this sweater for myself. As a female who is a size 0/1 or xs/s. I got the size small and honestly it was a perfect fit minus the arms were longer which was great as I have long arms but for someone who doesn‚Äôt they might find this big on them. It was soft and a great colour the white/grey. I even just ordered another in black.

Im a female,115 and 5"5. Bought this is an small. Super comfy sweatshirt but I prefer the medium size better. The small is a bit too short for my preference. But I still wear it. It's good quality for the price. I've actually bought a few of these now

Bought for my son as part of a hallowed costume so wasn‚Äôt worried about the quality but was pleasantly surprised! Fits well, soft inside and he will actually wear it again, really great value for the price too and arrived super quick!

Literally amazing. I got white and now I will be buying 3 more colours. for the price you cannot go wrong, plus the inside is super soft fleece so they‚Äôre amazing quality!! Perfect slouchy look if you get your regular size! I usually wear small & the small fits perfect. Love love love!!

review_title: Someone said I look like a pumpkin
reviews: I am a woman, usually wear size 4 / small but I love the baggy sweater feeling - it's so comforting. I bought this to wear around the house and have worn it a couple times while running errands. The other week I went to a friend's house and someone said I look like a pumpkin. The orange is BRIGHT. It's definitely a safety orange - which initially threw me off but now I love it. And I love pumpkins!

And a perfect fit.

I was looking for a great crew neck. I'm a small woman who usually wears a size small/size 4 in tops so I ordered the small considering it is in men's sizing. I wanted a great sweatshirt that fit a bit oversized but was tight around the wrists and waistband. This is an absolute perfect sweatshirt and fits exactly, if not even better than expected. I read all the reviews and many people talk about how thin it is. They are right, the fabric is a bit thin not as thick as a usual sweatshirt but it is still soft and warm enough to wear on a cold day. So worth the low price!! the ash colour is beautiful and looks so much like an aritzia sweater, definitely want to order another colour.

I think it's a great sweater but I think it's horrible for people to advertise this as eco-friendly. You're taking a traceable form of pollution like plastic bottles and turning all the plastic into untraceable pollution. Because every time one of these sweaters is put in a washing machine it introduces microplastics to the water table. This is a great sweater but absolutely not eco-friendly and it's a shame Hanes is maliciously taking advantage of that marketing ploy.

My husband loves these sweaters! True to size fitting, super soft fleecy material inside, soft outer material, nice sleeve length and all around warm and comfortable. Great price, nice Colors to choose from and free prime shipping! I highly recommend these sweaters.

I love how it fits properly and the colour is as bright and as neon as expected! I bought this specifically to match a necklace that I own, and I bought it and don‚Äôt regret it! Even though it‚Äôs a men‚Äôs sweater it fits me very well. If you are looking for a good quality sweater than this is a good buy!
